mapper.select: select a.post_num_pk, a.post_title, b.mb_id, c.pbigc_name, d.psmallc_name, a.post_views, a.post_date from post a, member b , pbigc c, psmallc d , pmidc e where a.mb_num_pk = b.mb_num_pk and a.psmallc_pk = d.psmallc_pk and d.pmidc_pk = e.pmidc_pk and e.pbigc_pk = c.pbigc_pk
select count(*) postcount from post a, member b , pbigc c, psmallc d , pmidc e where a.mb_num_pk = b.mb_num_pk and a.psmallc_pk = d.psmallc_pk and d.pmidc_pk = e.pmidc_pk and e.pbigc_pk = c.pbigc_pk

select a.post_title, b.mb_id, a.post_date, a.post_views, a.post_con, c.pbigc_name, d.psmallc_name, a.post_price, a.post_num_pk from post a, member b , pbigc c, psmallc d, pmidc e where a.mb_num_pk = b.mb_num_pk and a.psmallc_pk = d.psmallc_pk and d.pmidc_pk = e.pmidc_pk and e.pbigc_pk = c.pbigc_pk and a.post_num_pk = #{post_num_pk}
select ntc_num_pk, ntc_title, ntc_con, ntc_date, ntc_views FROM NOTICE
select ntc_num_pk, ntc_title, ntc_con, ntc_date, ntc_views FROM NOTICE where ntc_num_pk = #{ntc_num_pk}

SELECT * FROM ( select mb_id ,a.mb_num_pk,a.mb_name,a.mb_emaile,(select count(*) from po_report b where a.mb_num_pk = b.porp_target_mbn ) as report, (select count(*) from re_report c where a.mb_num_pk = c.rerp_target_mbn and RERP_CAT=1 ) as review_gyz, (select count(*) from re_report c where a.mb_num_pk = c.rerp_target_mbn and RERP_CAT=2 ) as review_sbr from member a ) t WHERE t.report >=1 OR t.review_gyz >= 1 OR t.review_sbr >= 1

SELECT count(*) FROM ( select mb_id ,a.mb_num_pk,a.mb_name,a.mb_emaile,(select count(*) from po_report b where a.mb_num_pk = b.porp_target_mbn ) as report, (select count(*) from re_report c where a.mb_num_pk = c.rerp_target_mbn and RERP_CAT=1 ) as review_gyz, (select count(*) from re_report c where a.mb_num_pk = c.rerp_target_mbn and RERP_CAT=2 ) as review_sbr from member a ) t WHERE t.report >=1 OR t.review_gyz >= 1 OR t.review_sbr >= 1

select b.mb_num_pk,a.post_title, b.mb_id, a.post_date, a.post_con, d.pbigc_name, c.psmallc_name, a.post_price, e.porp_con, e.porp_date,e.porp_num_pk ,(select g.mb_id from member g, po_report h where h.porp_mbn = g.mb_num_pk and h.porp_mbn = #{porp_mbn}) porping_mbn from post a, member b, psmallc c, pbigc d, po_report e, pmidc f where e.porp_target_mbn = b.mb_num_pk and e.porp_lnb = a.post_num_pk and c.pmidc_pk = f.pmidc_pk and f.pbigc_pk = d.pbigc_pk and c.psmallc_pk = a.psmallc_pk and b.mb_num_pk = #{mb_num_pk} and e.porp_mbn = #{porp_mbn}

select a.vr_rvn_pk,a.mb_id_pk, c.post_title, c.post_date, a.vr_rvc, d.mb_id, b.rerp_date, b.rerp_con, b.rerp_target_mbn, b.rerp_cat from vlntr_rv a ,re_report b , post c , member d where a.vr_rvn_pk = b.rerp_lnb and c.post_num_pk = a.post_num_pk and b.rerp_mbn = d.mb_num_pk and b.rerp_mbn = #{rerp_mbn} and b.rerp_cat = 1

select a.er_num_pk,a.mb_id_pk, c.post_title, c.post_date, a.er_rvc, d.mb_id, b.rerp_date, b.rerp_con, b.rerp_target_mbn, b.rerp_cat from ern_rv a ,re_report b , post c , member d where a.er_num_pk = b.rerp_lnb and c.post_num_pk = a.post_num_pk and b.rerp_mbn = d.mb_num_pk and b.rerp_mbn = #{rerp_mbn} and b.rerp_cat = 2

SELECT a.mb_id, a.mb_num_pk,b.porp_mbn, c.post_title,t.mb_id as mbn_id from member a, po_report b , post c ,( select t.mb_id ,t.mb_num_pk from member t , po_report b where t.mb_num_pk = b.porp_mbn AND b.porp_target_mbn = #{mb_num_pk} )t where b.porp_target_mbn = a.mb_num_pk and b.porp_lnb = c.post_num_pk AND t.mb_num_pk = b.porp_mbn

select a.mb_id,b.rerp_cat,b.rerp_mbn, a.mb_num_pk, b.rerp_con,t.mb_id as mbn_id from member a, re_report b ,(select t.mb_id ,t.mb_num_pk from member t , re_report b where t.mb_num_pk = b.rerp_mbn and b.rerp_cat = #{rerp_cat} AND b.rerp_target_mbn = #{mb_num_pk}) t where b.rerp_target_mbn = a.mb_num_pk and t.mb_num_pk = b.rerp_mbn
